trans-unit.source: Represents the table drawn by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> control at run time.
trans-unit.target: 表示绘制的表<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref>控件在运行时。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> control displays data in the form of a grid.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>控件的网格的形式显示数据。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The DataGridTableStyle is a class that represents the drawn grid only.
trans-unit.target: DataGridTableStyle 是一个类，表示绘制的网格。

trans-unit.source: This grid should not be confused with the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> class, which is a possible source of data for the grid.
trans-unit.target: 此网格不应与混淆<xref:System.Data.DataTable>类，它是可能的网格的数据源。</xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: Instead, the DataGridTableStyle strictly represents the grid as it is painted in the control.
trans-unit.target: 相反，DataGridTableStyle 严格表示网格控件中绘制。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, through the DataGridTableStyle you can control the appearance of the grid for each <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，通过 DataGridTableStyle 可以控制每个<xref:System.Data.DataTable>。</xref:System.Data.DataTable>网格的外观

trans-unit.source: To specify which DataGridTableStyle is used when displaying data from a particular <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> to the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> of a <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定哪些 DataGridTableStyle 所时使用显示数据从尤其是<xref:System.Data.DataTable>，将设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>到<xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A>的一种<xref:System.Data.DataTable>。</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection> retrieved through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A> property contains all the DataGridTableStyle objects used by a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>通过检索<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A>属性包含使用的所有 DataGridTableStyle 对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>

trans-unit.source: The collection can contain as many DataGridTableStyle objects as you need, however the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> of each must be unique.
trans-unit.target: 集合可以包含任意多个 DataGridTableStyle 对象根据需要但是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>每个必须唯一。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>

trans-unit.source: At run time, this allows you to substitute a different DataGridTableStyle for the same data, depending on the user's preference.
trans-unit.target: 在运行时，这使你可以用相同的数据，具体取决于用户的首选项不同 DataGridTableStyle。

trans-unit.source: To do this: 1.
trans-unit.target: 若要执行此操作︰ 1。

trans-unit.source: Populate the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection> with DataGridTableStyle objects.
trans-unit.target: 填充<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>DataGridTableStyle 对象。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>

trans-unit.source: If a DataGridTableStyle exists in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection> whose <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> property value equals the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> object's <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> property, the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> is displayed with this DataGridTableStyle.
trans-unit.target: 如果在存在 DataGridTableStyle<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>属性值等于<xref:System.Data.DataTable>对象的<xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A>属性，<xref:System.Data.DataTable>显示与此 DataGridTableStyle。</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>

trans-unit.source: If no DataGridTableStyle exists with a matching <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>, the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> is displayed with the default style for data grid tables.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有 DataGridTableStyle 存在具有匹配<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>、<xref:System.Data.DataTable>显示与数据网格表的默认样式。</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>

trans-unit.source: When a different grid style is needed, use the `Item` property to select the appropriate DataGridTableStyle (pass the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Item%2A> property) and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> of the returned object to a new value.
trans-unit.target: 当需要不同的网格样式时，使用`Item`属性选择适当的 DataGridTableStyle (传递<xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A>到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Item%2A>属性) 和设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>返回的对象为新值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Item%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Item%2A> property to select the desired DataGridTableStyle, and set its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> to the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> of the <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Item%2A>属性选择所需的 DataGridTableStyle，并将设置其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>到<xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A>的<xref:System.Data.DataTable>。</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Always create <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects and add them to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> before adding DataGridTableStyle objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!CAUTION]&1;> 始终创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>对象，并将其添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>之前添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection> DataGridTableStyle 对象</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: When you add an empty DataGridTableStyle with a valid <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> value to the collection, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects are automatically generated for you.
trans-unit.target: 当你将添加使用一个有效空 DataGridTableStyle<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>到集合中，值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>自动为你生成的对象。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Consequently, an exception will be thrown if you try to add new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects with duplicate <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> values to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你尝试添加新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>对象的重复<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>值到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>因此，将引发异常

trans-unit.source: To determine which DataGridTableStyle is currently displayed, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> to return a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定哪些 DataGridTableStyle 目前显示，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A><xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>返回一种<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>属性</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the data source implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypedList> interface, you can use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypedList.GetListName%2A> method to return the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> of the current table.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据源实现<xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypedList>接口，你可以使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypedList.GetListName%2A>方法以返回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>的当前表。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypedList.GetListName%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypedList>

trans-unit.source: This is shown in the C# code below: ``` private void PrintCurrentListName(DataGrid myDataGrid){ CurrencyManager myCM = (CurrencyManager) BindingContext[myDataGrid.DataSource, myDataGrid.DataMember]; IList myList = myCM.List; ITypedList thisList = (ITypedList) myList; Console.WriteLine(thisList.GetListName(null)); } ``` If the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> contains <xref:System.Data.DataTable> objects related through <xref:System.Data.DataRelation> objects, and the currently displayed <xref:System.Data.DataTable> is a child table, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A> will return a string in the form of TableName.RelationName (in the simplest case).
trans-unit.target: 这下面的 C# 代码中所示︰``` private void PrintCurrentListName(DataGrid myDataGrid){ CurrencyManager myCM = (CurrencyManager) BindingContext[myDataGrid.DataSource, myDataGrid.DataMember]; IList myList = myCM.List; ITypedList thisList = (ITypedList) myList; Console.WriteLine(thisList.GetListName(null)); } ```如果<xref:System.Data.DataSet>包含<xref:System.Data.DataTable>通过相关对象<xref:System.Data.DataRelation>对象和当前显示<xref:System.Data.DataTable>是子表中，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A>将 TableName.RelationName （中的最简单的情况下） 的形式返回字符串。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataRelation> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> is further down in the hierarchy, the string will consist of the parent table's name followed by the necessary <xref:System.Data.DataRelation.RelationName%2A> values required to reach the table's level.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Data.DataTable>是进一步向下层次结构，该字符串将包含父表的名称后跟所需的<xref:System.Data.DataRelation.RelationName%2A>到达表的级别所需的值。</xref:System.Data.DataRelation.RelationName%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: For example, imagine three <xref:System.Data.DataTable> objects in a hierarchical relationship named (top to bottom) `Regions`, `Customers`, and `Orders`, and two <xref:System.Data.DataRelation> objects named `RegionsToCustomers` and `CustomersToOrders`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A> property will return "Regions.RegionsToCustomers.CustomersToOrders".
trans-unit.target: 例如，假设三个<xref:System.Data.DataTable>层次结构关系名为 （上到下） 中的对象`Regions`， `Customers`，和`Orders`，和两个<xref:System.Data.DataRelation>对象命名的`RegionsToCustomers`和`CustomersToOrders`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A>属性将返回"Regions.RegionsToCustomers.CustomersToOrders"。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataRelation> </xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> will then be "Orders".
trans-unit.target: 但是，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>然后将"Orders"。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The collection of DataGridTableStyle objects is returned through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 通过<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A><xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>属性</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A>返回的 DataGridTableStyle 对象的集合

trans-unit.source: When a DataGridTableStyle is displayed, the settings for the DataGridTableStyle will override the settings for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> control.
trans-unit.target: 当显示 DataGridTableStyle 时，DataGridTableStyle 的设置将替代的设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If a value is not set for a particular DataGridTableStyle property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> control's value will be used instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有为特定的 DataGridTableStyle 属性，设置一个值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>将改为使用控件的值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The following list shows the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> properties that can be set to override <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> control properties: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.AllowSorting%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.AlternatingBackColor%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.BackColor%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.ColumnHeadersVisible%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.ForeColor%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.GridLineColor%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.GridLineStyle%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.HeaderBackColor%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.HeaderFont%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.HeaderForeColor%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.LinkColor%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.PreferredColumnWidth%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.PreferredRowHeight%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.ReadOnly%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.RowHeadersVisible%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.RowHeaderWidth%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.SelectionBackColor%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.SelectionForeColor%2A> To bind the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> to a strongly typed array of objects, the object type must contain public properties.
trans-unit.target: 下面的列表显示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>属性，可设置为重写<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>控制属性:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.AllowSorting%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.AlternatingBackColor%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.BackColor%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.GridLineStyle%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.HeaderBackColor%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.HeaderFont%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.HeaderForeColor%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.LinkColor%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.PreferredColumnWidth%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.PreferredRowHeight%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.ReadOnly%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.RowHeadersVisible%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.RowHeaderWidth%2A>- </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.SelectionForeColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.SelectionBackColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.RowHeaderWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.RowHeadersVisible%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.ReadOnly%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.HeaderBackColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.GridLineStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.GridLineColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.ForeColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.ColumnHeadersVisible%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: To create a DataGridTableStyle that displays the array, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `typename` where `typename` is replaced by the name of the object type.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建显示数组 DataGridTableStyle，设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性`typename`其中`typename`由对象类型的名称替换。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Also note that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> property is case-sensitive; the type name must be matched exactly.
trans-unit.target: 另请注意，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>属性是区分大小写; 必须完全匹配的类型名称。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> property for an example.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>有关示例的属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also bind the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> to an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以绑定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>到<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>。</xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: A feature of the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> is that it can contain objects of multiple types, but the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> can only bind to such a list when all items in the list are of the same type as the first item.
trans-unit.target: 一项功能<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>是，它可以包含多个类型的对象但<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>与第一项相同的类型的列表中的所有项时只能绑定到此类列表。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> </xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>

trans-unit.source: This means that all objects must either be of the same type, or they must inherit from the same class as the first item in the list.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着所有对象必须都是相同的类型，或者它们必须从列表中的第一个项相同的类继承。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the first item in a list is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>, the second item could be a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> (which inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>).
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果在列表中的第一项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>，第二个项可能是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>(其继承自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>)。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>

trans-unit.source: If, on the other hand, the first item is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>, the second object cannot be a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>.
trans-unit.target: 如果在另一方面，第一项是一个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>、 第二个对象不能为一种<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: Further, the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> must have items in it when it is bound and the objects in the DataGridTableStyle must contain public properties.
trans-unit.target: 此外，<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>时将其绑定和 DataGridTableStyle 中的对象必须包含公共属性必须具有在其中的项。</xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>

trans-unit.source: An empty <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> will result in an empty grid.
trans-unit.target: 一个空<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>将导致空网格。</xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>

trans-unit.source: When binding to an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> of the DataGridTableStyle to "ArrayList" (the type name).
trans-unit.target: 绑定到时<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>，将其设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>的到"ArrayList"（类型名称） DataGridTableStyle。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> </xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle"></xref> class using the specified value to determine whether the grid table is the default style.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name used to map this table to a specific data source.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用来将此表映射到特定数据源的名称。

trans-unit.source: To bind the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> to a strongly typed array of objects, the object type must contain public properties.
trans-unit.target: 若要将绑定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>对象类型必须为对象的强类型化数组包含公共属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: To create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> that displays the array, set the MappingName property to `typename` where `typename` is replaced by the name of the object type.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>显示数组时，将 MappingName 属性设置为`typename`其中`typename`由对象类型的名称替换。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>

trans-unit.source: Also note that the MappingName property is case-sensitive; the type name must be matched exactly.
trans-unit.target: 另请注意，MappingName 属性是区分大小写;必须完全匹配的类型名称。

trans-unit.source: See the MappingName property for an example.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅示例 MappingName 属性。

trans-unit.source: You can also bind the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> to an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以绑定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>到<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>。</xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: A feature of the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> is that it can contain objects of multiple types, but the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> can only bind to such a list when all items in the list are of the same type as the first item.
trans-unit.target: 一项功能<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>是，它可以包含多个类型的对象但<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>与第一项相同的类型的列表中的所有项时只能绑定到此类列表。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> </xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>

trans-unit.source: This means that all objects must either be of the same type, or they must inherit from the same class as the first item in the list.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着所有对象必须都是相同的类型，或者它们必须从列表中的第一个项相同的类继承。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the first item in a list is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>, the second item could be a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> (which inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>).
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果在列表中的第一项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>，第二个项可能是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>(其继承自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>)。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>

trans-unit.source: If, on the other hand, the first item is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>, the second object cannot be a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>.
trans-unit.target: 如果在另一方面，第一项是一个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>、 第二个对象不能为一种<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: Further, the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> must have items in it when it is bound.
trans-unit.target: 此外，<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>时将其绑定必须具有在其中的项。</xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>

trans-unit.source: An empty <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> will result in an empty grid.
trans-unit.target: 一个空<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>将导致空网格。</xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>

trans-unit.source: When binding to an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>, set the MappingName of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> to "ArrayList" (the type name).
trans-unit.target: 绑定到时<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>，设置的 MappingName<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>到"ArrayList"（类型名称）。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> </xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>

trans-unit.source: The default is the name of the list managed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> for this grid.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是由管理的列表的名称<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>此网格。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> is set using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>使用设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingNameChanged> event occurs when the MappingName value changes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingNameChanged>MappingName 值更改时发生事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingNameChanged>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width used to create columns when a new grid is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于显示新网格时创建列的宽度。

trans-unit.source: The width used to create columns when a new grid is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 若要显示新网格时创建列所用的宽度。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.PreferredColumnWidth*> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.PreferredColumnWidth*>属性值更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.PreferredColumnWidth*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height used to create a row when a new grid is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于显示新网格时创建的行的高度。

trans-unit.source: The preferred height is the minimum height needed to accommodate the displayed text with the assigned <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.HeaderFont%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 首选的高度是适应分配<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.HeaderFont%2A>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.HeaderFont%2A>显示的文本所需的最小高度

trans-unit.source: A row will not be created with a height less than the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 行不会创建与高度小于指定值。

trans-unit.source: If the font size requires it, however, the row height may be greater than the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 如果将字体大小需要它，但是，可能大于指定值的行高度。

trans-unit.source: The height of a row, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 行，以像素为单位的高度。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.PreferredRowHeight*> value changes.
trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.PreferredRowHeight*>值更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.PreferredRowHeight*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether columns can be edited.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否可以编辑列。

trans-unit.source: You can also specify whether individual columns within the table are editable by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> class's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.ReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to an appropriate value, `true` or `false`.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以指定表中的单个列是否可编辑通过设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>类的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.ReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName>为适当的值，属性`true`或`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.ReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, to ensure that the data is not edited, you can set the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> class's <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ReadOnly%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 或者，若要确保不能编辑数据，可以设置<xref:System.Data.DataColumn>类的<xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ReadOnly%2A>属性`true`。</xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ReadOnly%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if columns cannot be edited; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果无法编辑列;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.ReadOnly*>值更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.ReadOnly*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether row headers are visible.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示行标题是否可见。

trans-unit.source: When row headers are visible, a plus sign is displayed in each row header if the underlying <xref:System.Data.DataTable> has a related child table.
trans-unit.target: 如果在行标题可见时，每个行标题中显示一个加号基础<xref:System.Data.DataTable>具有相关的子表。</xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: This property will not function until you add <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 直到你将<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>对象</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>上此属性不起作用

trans-unit.source: Until then, setting this property will have no effect.
trans-unit.target: 到那时，设置此属性将产生任何影响。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if row headers are visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果行标题可见，则否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.RowHeadersVisible*> value changes.
trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.RowHeadersVisible*>值更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.RowHeadersVisible*>

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of row headers.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置行标题的宽度。

trans-unit.source: When row headers are visible a plus sign is displayed in each row header if the underlying data has a related child table.
trans-unit.target: 在行标题可见时如果基础数据中有一个相关的子表，每个行标题中会显示一个加号。

trans-unit.source: This property will not function until you add <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 直到你将<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>对象</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>上此属性不起作用

trans-unit.source: Until then, setting this property will have no effect.
trans-unit.target: 到那时，设置此属性将产生任何影响。

trans-unit.source: The width of row headers, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 行标题，以像素为单位的宽度。
